channel.title: Making life alot easier with my question answer quide
channel.description:
question... - Q answer... - A
Q: how do i make safezones A: go into client.java and search nonwild...scroll to the end of the list and enter it in
Q:what does absX < and absX > mean... A: absX < means the co-ordinate in east absX > means co-ordinate going to the west
Q: what does absY < mean and absY > mean A: absY < means co-ordinate going north absY > means co-ordinate going sourth
Q: how do i port forward A: go into your routers ip and go into setup ports enter port 43594
Q: hot do i get on my server A: download no-ip.duc and check your server
Q: how do i make custom models and weapons A: get a model maker and design your thingy/ draw a picture of front view back view side view and top view then scan the pictures into a model editor and color them
for more questions answered just pm me the question

item.title: Making life alot easier with my question answer quide
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Is this some kind of sick joke?

  1. absX > #

#: things east (you said west)

  1. Above but vise versa

  2. Same as 1 & 2 but for absY

  3. If you don’t get it; look at a graph from math.

  4. port forwarding would need more explaintion

  5. wtf is this?

I mean I know you are trying to help… but no order… false info…errr

Read full topic

item.title: Making life alot easier with my question answer quide
item.dc:creator: @wolf_scaper wolf scaper
item.description:
@wolf_scaper wrote:

question… - Q
answer… - A

Q: how do i make safezones
A: go into client.java and search nonwild…scroll to the end of the list and enter it in

Q:what does absX < and absX > mean…
A: absX < means the co-ordinate in east absX > means co-ordinate going to the west

Q: what does absY < mean and absY > mean
A: absY < means co-ordinate going north absY > means co-ordinate going sourth

Q: how do i port forward
A: go into your routers ip and go into setup ports enter port 43594

Q: hot do i get on my server
A: download no-ip.duc and check your server

Q: how do i make custom models and weapons
A: get a model maker and design your thingy/ draw a picture of front view back view side view and top view then scan the pictures into a model editor and color them

for more questions answered just pm me the question
